name: Mob's Trip to the Dairy Farm
name_original: Mob's Trip to the Dairy Farm
description:
Mob's been having a rough day. What better way to cheer him up than taking him to a dairy farm!

This is a short fan visual novel based on the anime Mob Psycho 100. It is adapted from a oneshot by hisfoolishgirl and has fully animated sprites.

You can support the artist, kaybdoodles, on her tumblr or on her patreon -https://www.patreon.com/kaylamitchell

You can support hisfoolishgirl on her archiveofourown -http://archiveofourown.org/users/hisfoolishgirl/ps...

Thanks for playing!
